verses.roman:
vṛndāvane vaise yata vaiṣṇava-maṇḍala
kṛṣṇa-nāma-parāyaṇa, parama-maṅgala

synonyms: vṛndāvane—in Vṛndāvana; vaise—there are; yata—all; vaiṣṇava-maṇḍala—groups of devotees; kṛṣṇa-nāma-parāyaṇa—addicted to the name of Lord Kṛṣṇa; parama-maṅgala—all-auspicious.
translation: All the groups of Vaiṣṇavas who live in Vṛndāvana are absorbed in chanting the all-auspicious name of Kṛṣṇa.
